api.title: createNewClient
api.name: createNewClient
api.description: This call creates a new wemalo connect and wemalo client and can be called by admin users only.

Parameter.description: desired name of the user account to create (must be unique!)
users company name (this company will be created as client in wemalo)

api.title: addGoodsOrder
api.name: addGoodsOrder
api.description: Adds a new goods order in wemalo backend. Afterwards, the order can be used for creating picking lists etc.

RestError.description: If serial number is set, quantity must not be higher then 1.

Parameter.description: if not set, externalId will be used as order number

for matching a dispatcher. In this field you'll have to enter a reference that will be also be set in Wemalo to match your dispatcher profile with wemalos dispatcher profile (e.g. for DHL express oder DPD cash on delivery).
sku|externalId if match should be done by sku, otherwise positions will be matched by external id (default)
specified information to be shown during picking
goods will be reserved, but order stays in status "partially reserved" until date has been reached (format yyyy-MM-dd)
if order is blocked (int 1), it will be packed but not sent until is has been approved (default=0)
package weight in g for fast send orders
There can only be one primary receiver
if street number is not set, wemalo tries extracting it from street field
If a serial number is set, you have to create a new position for each serial number.
If a serial number is set, quantity can only be 1. Default quantity is also 1.
You may set an identifier to get access to concrete positions afterwards (e.g. for deleting a position).

api.title: addGoodsOrderPosition
api.name: addGoodsOrderPosition
api.description: Adds positions to an existing goods order

Parameter.description: sku if match should be done by sku, otherwise positions will be matched by external id (default)
If a serial number is set, you have to create a new position for each serial number.
If a serial number is set, quantity can only be 1. Default quantity is also 1.
You may set an identifier to get access to concrete positions afterwards (e.g. for deleting a position).

RestError.description: If serial number is set, quantity must not be higher then 1.

api.title: addGoodsOrderDocument
api.name: addGoodsOrderdocument
api.description: Adds a document to an existing goods order. Currently, only .pdf files are being supported. The file limit has been set to 50mb per document.

Parameter.description: optional file url. If this url is set, wemalo will download the given file and convert it as base64. In this case, the base64 parameter must not be set.

api.title: addOrderNote
api.name: addOrderNote
api.description: Adds a note to an existing goods order. By providing the external id, wemalo will be loading the order and stick the note to it. It will be shown in the frontend.

api.title: addTrackingNumber
api.name: addTrackingNumber
api.description: Adds a tracking number to an existing package

api.title: cancelGoodsOrder
api.name: cancelGoodsOrder
api.description: Cancels an existing goods order, if the order was not picked/packed yet.

Parameter.description: a reason why this order has been cancelled

api.title: changeGoodsOrderPriority
api.name: changeGoodsOrderPriority
api.description: Updates a goods order priority

Parameter.description: a number between 0 (highest priority) and 5. Default priority is 3.

api.title: deleteReservations
api.name: deleteReservations
api.description: deletes all reservations on partially reserved and open orders

Success 200.description: true if the package was handed over successfully
number of orders that have been updated

api.title: finishOrder
api.name: finishOrder
api.description: If an order hasn't been picked yet, this call picks and packs the order, generates a shipping label and sends it

Parameter.description: total weight as double in g (e.g. 1000 for 1kg)

Success 200.description: true if the order was handed over successfully

api.title: getGoodsOrderStatus
api.name: getGoodsOrderStatus
api.description: Returns a goods order status.

Success 200.description:
• PARTIAL=partially reserved, e.g. due to missing articles, address data or bill if required
  • OPEN=goods were reserved and picking list can be created
  • INPROCESS=picking list was created
  • READYFORSHIPMENT=order has been picked completely
  • BLOCKEDPACKED=packed, but not finished for sending it (e.g. due to missing documents)
  • PACKED=packed and ready to be shipped
  • SHIPPED=has been shipped
  • CANCELLED=cancelled
if blocked, e.g. due to failure while creating shipping label

api.title: getOrderPackages
api.name: getOrderPackages
api.description: Returns all packed parcels by order (either wemalo internal order id or external order id must be provided)

Parameter.description: wemalo internal goods order id (if not set, the external id must be set)
external goods order id (set via post call)

Success 200.description: if an error occured while creating the shipping label, the error message will be shown up here
package total weight (items + packaging material) in g
total quantity of items in this package
true if the package has already been handed over to dispatcher
storage cell name if not handed over yet
serial number if available (quantity will then be 1)
unit name (as provided in post unit call)
wemalo internal unit id (will be returned when creating an unit)

api.title: getProfiles
api.name: getProfiles
api.description: Returns available dispatcher profiles usable in goods orders.

Success 200.description: profile matching id (to be used when adding a new goods order)

examples.title: Success-Response:

api.title: getSentPackages
api.name: getSentPackages
api.description: Returns sent goods order packages by timerange or external id.

Parameter.description: page number, in case there're multiple pages with query results

Success 200.description: current page number (if search result contains multiple pages)
external goods order id (see field externalId in addGoodsOrder)

api.title: getSentPackagesByFlag
api.name: getSentPackagesByFlag
api.description: Returns sent goods order packages by without synch date set and (optionally) by external id.

Parameter.description: page number, in case there're multiple pages with query results

Success 200.description: wemalo internal order status id (if set to 500, the order has been sent completely)

api.title: getShippingLabel
api.name: getShippingLabel
api.description: Returns shipping labels attached to the goods order parcel. Normally, only one label is being created for a goods order parcel.

Parameter.description: wemalo internal goods order parcel id (will be transmitted via webhook)

api.title: getTrackingNumber
api.name: getTrackingNumber
api.description: Returns tracking number attached to parcel

Parameter.description: wemalo internal goods order parcel id (will be transmitted via webhook)

Success 200.description: wemalo internal dispatching profile name, e.g. DHL Paket National

api.title: putSentPackagesFlag
api.name: putSentPackagesFlag
api.description: Adds a synch date to a booking history entry.

api.title: removeGoodsOrderPosition
api.name: removeGoodsOrderPosition
api.description: Removes a goods order position

api.title: sentPackage
api.name: sentPackage
api.description: Handing over an already packed package by its internal id.

Parameter.description: for matching a dispatcher profile. If no profile is provided, the tracking number will not be added.

Success 200.description: true if the package was handed over successfully

api.title: updateGoodsOrderMeta
api.name: updateGoodsOrderMeta
api.description: Updates existing goods order meta information

Parameter.description: if not set, externalId will be used as order number

for matching a dispatcher. In this field you'll have to enter a reference that will be also be set in Wemalo to match your dispatcher profile with wemalos dispatcher profile (e.g. for DHL express oder DPD cash on delivery).
sku|externalId if match should be done by sku, otherwise positions will be matched by external id (default)
specified information to be shown during picking
goods will be reserved, but order stays in status "partially reserved" until date has been reached (format yyyy-MM-dd)
if order is blocked (int 1), it will be packed but not sent until is has been approved (default=0)
package weight in g for fast send orders
There can only be one primary receiver
if street number is not set, wemalo tries extracting it from street field

api.title: addGoodsReceipt
api.name: addGoodsReceipt
api.description: Adds a new goods receipt order. Stock is not being booked yet, but when articles arrive it can be booked against the announced quantities.

Parameter.description: fills a notice field shown in order meta data
wemalos product id: either this id or the external identifier has to be set
products external identifier: either this identifier or the wemalos product id has to be set

wemalo internal product unit id (e.g. for specifing a position as BOX, see product units). Example: unit was set up with quantity of 5 and items quantity was set to 2. wemalo will expect receiving 10 items in total.

api.title: getIncomingBookings
api.name: getIncomingBookings
api.description: Returns incoming bookings by timerange.

Parameter.description: page number, in case there're multiple pages with query results

Success 200.description: customers order number in goods receipt order

api.title: addImage
api.name: addImage
api.description: Adds an image as base64 to an existing product.

api.title: addMultiple
api.name: addMultiple
api.description: Adds a bunch of new products

Parameter.description: See add/update products for detailed information about properties within this array

api.title: addProduct
api.name: addProduct
api.description: Adds a new product master data set.

Parameter.description: it's basically your ID. It's being used to match the wemalo product with your product (e.g. as goods order position)
stock keeping unit, might be the same as the external id and has to be unique
ideally, this is being set to enable scanning while picking & packing
true if serial number should be scanned
determines whether a product is active or not. Default is set to true.
if set to true, articles will not be reserved and not be picked at all.

api.title: addProduct
api.name: addProduct
api.description: Adds a new product

Parameter.description: it's basically your ID. It's being used to match the wemalo product with your product (e.g. as goods order position)
stock keeping unit, might be the same as the external id and has to be unique
ideally, this is being set to enable scanning while picking & packing
true if serial number should be scanned

api.title: addUnit
api.name: addUnit
api.description: Adds a new unit or updates an existing one. It won't be possible updating unit name or value.

Parameter.description: unit type, e.g. box (parameter name BOX), handle unit (HANDLE_UNIT) or palett (PALLET)
defines how many items are inside an unit
units name that is being displayed while pick&pack etc.
wemalo internal product unit id. Should be set for updating an existing unit.

Success 200.description: if created/updated successfully, the internal wemalo id will be returned

api.title: availableStock
api.name: availableStock
api.description: Loads available stock since date by attribute. All products that have stock changes in the given timeframe will be reported back.

Success 200.description: if it's a set article, athe product might have a virtual quantity
true if it's the default attribute (e.g. 1. choice)

api.title: changeActiveFlag
api.name: changeActiveFlag
api.description: changes the active flag of a product. Inactive products can't be used for picking/packing.

Parameter.description: true, if the prouct can be used

api.title: getAllProducts
api.name: getAllProducts
api.description: Loads all products that were updated since the given update date

api.title: getNotFlaggedBookings
api.name: getNotFlaggedBookings
api.description: Loads bookings that were not synchronized yet. After loading the bookings, they need to be flagged as synchronized via the respective PUT call.

Parameter.description:
booing reason to be downloaded

  • INCOMING => incoming stock bookings
  • RETURNSHIPMENT => return bookings
  • PACK_PARCEL => packed items (not sent)
  • SENT => sent items
  • INVENTORY_IN => positive inventory bookings
  • INVENTORY_OUT => negative inventory bookings

Success 200.description: maximum numbers of booking items per page
true if an additional page is available
in case of a goods order parcel, this might contain position information from external sources
wemalo booking history id (to set a history entry as synchronized via PUT call)

api.name: getProduct

api.title: getUnits
api.name: getUnits
api.description: Loads existing product units by external product identifier

Success 200.description: unit type, e.g. box (parameter name BOX), handle unit (HANDLE_UNIT) or palett (PALLET)
defines how many items are inside an unit
if activated, units will be shown while pick&pack etc.
units name that is being displayed while pick&pack etc.

api.title: setFlaggedBookings
api.name: setFlaggedBookings
api.description: Sets booking history entries as synchronized.

Parameter.description: array with history ids that have been synchronized. You may update up to 50 entries per call!

Success 200.description: true if all items have been updated

api.title: updateProduct
api.name: updateProduct
api.description: Updates an existing product

api.title: getRefurbishment
api.name: getRefurbishment
api.description: returns information about refurbishments. Either sku, serial number or external id needs to be set.

Parameter.description: by setting this parameter to true, only results related to given serialnumber (if set) will be returned
page number, in case there're multiple pages with query results

Success 200.description: if serial number was changed, new and old serial number will be displayed (old=>new)
in case of checkboxes, this field is set to boolean true/false. Otherwise the entered value will be shown.

api.title: addReturnsDocument
api.name: addReturnsDocument
api.description: Adds a document to an announced return order

api.title: announceReturn
api.name: announceReturn
api.description: Creates a new announced return object

Parameter.description: External goods order id (to set a reference to the original order)
fills a notice field shown when scanning returns
true if positions should not be checked against sent order
wemalos product id: either this id or the external identifier has to be set
products external identifier: either this identifier or the wemalos product id has to be set. You may also use your sku as identifier.

api.title: getBookedReturns
api.name: getBookedReturns
api.description: returns booked returns that were not synchronized yet

Parameter.description: page number, in case there're multiple pages with query results

Success 200.description: true if it's the default attribute (e.g. 1. choice)

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
 "page": 0,
 "additionalPage": false,

 	id=8219212, "bookingDate"="14.05.2017 19:26:55", "attributeCode": "1. choice", attributeDefault: true,
 	"reasonCode": "damaged"}],	
 "Success":true
 }

api.title: putSynchedReturnsFlag
api.name: putSynchedReturnsFlag
api.description: Adds a synch date to a booking history entry.

api.title: getGenericInterfaces
api.name: getGenericInterfaces
api.description: returns generic interfaces if set for given user

Success 200.description: generic list of shop related attributes, e.g. host name or user credentials

api.title: deleteWebHook
api.name: deleteWebHook
api.description: Removes a registered web hook event

api.title: getWebhooks
api.name: getWebhooks
api.description: loads a list of registered webhooks

api.title: registerWebHook
api.name: registerWebHook
api.description:
Registers a web hook that informs once something happens. The following webhooks are available:

EventnameDescription
status_updateInforms about updated goods order status. In post data you'll get the wemalo order id, external id and order number.
Field names: orderId, externalId, orderNumber
stock_changeAs soon as stock was booked, this event is being triggered. It contains update type (INCOMING_STOCK or RETURNSHIPMENT), order id and external id.
Field names: type, orderId, externalId
refurbishment_actionFor each new refurbishment entry, an event is fired. It will contain the refurbishment id.
Field names: refurbishmentId
trackingnumber_addedWill be called as soon as a new tracking number was added to a goods order parcel and informs about the order id and parcel id.
Field names: goodsOrderId, goodsOrderParcelId
When an event was triggered, wemalo will send a HTTP POST request to the endpoint defined in the webhook. The application waits up to 10 seconds for a succefully feedback. If no feedback comes back, wemalo retries sending the request few minutes later.
After 10 failed attempts, the webhook will be unregeristered automatically.

Parameter.description: a token that will be part of calls that you will be receiving. You may check for correct token to validate that the call came from us.
if webhook couldn't be executed, it will be deactivated and an email to this email is being sent

examples.title: Error email:
examples.content:
webhook event 'status_update' deactivated !

payload: http://yourpayload.url/somefolder
last error: not found
id: 95-1

This email was sent automatically. Please don't respond.
